comment:
Sep 21 - brew day
Sep 28 - keg day; needed fermentor for the roasty toasty porter; recovered 3/4 inch of yeast for the porter; FG 1.007; primed with 3/4 C corn sugar
Oct 4 - tasted, very foamy, not enough absorption of CO2 yet (expected), but great smell, and tasted damn fine for 13 days ! needs 2 weeks
